item.title: Hi there
Resume
item.description: Basic Information Full Name: Diego Esteban Sabolo Birth Date: March 31th 1980 Nationality: Argentina. Residency: Tigre, Buenos Aires, Argentina. Languages: Spanish (Native), English (Daily used) Work Experience 2018 - Present | Sr. Full Stack Developer at WeKnow.inc Working in Drupal projects for Phase2 Technologies. Drupal 8, 9. Design Systems (Particle/Patternlab). 2018 | External Consultant and Drupal Developer at NIC.ar Training and helping to the internal team to built the site, also contributing in development for Drupal themes and custom modules.
